availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: In Mercer County, a farmer named Jefferson Robards named his son Jefferson Robards. It is impossible to determine which Robards was engaged in this conflict.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “Jefferson Robards (January 28, 1804-September 3, 1882),” Memorial #44036929, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=44036929 (accessed June 5, 2017); Find A Grave, “Jefferson Robards (October 6, 1848-May 27, 1920),” Memorial #103879924, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=103879924 (accessed June 5, 2017).
